ygData.subject: Re: KitKat/Cam
ygData.msgSnippet: He wouldn t admit it, but the tone of her voice made him shudder with delight. However, he showed it a bit. He normally wasn t that shy with female

He wouldn't admit it, but the tone of her voice made him shudder with
delight. However, he showed it a bit. He normally wasn't that shy with
female Transformers, but with her, he seemed to have become a walking
noodle-bot.

Blackfang: Well... Huh... I guess you could say that... But there was
that one Terran tradition where they used to treat the wounded that
were both friendlies and enemies... I guess that's a fine tradition
with me.

In his head, he was just wondering what he was saying at all. He
usually made sense in his sentences!

Blackfang: You know, if you'd like to stay a while longer to make sure
your injury is repaired, you're welcome. I mean, it's not like we're
inhospitable, right Cam? We like everyone!

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "raccoon7679" <logomorph@h...> wrote:
> 
> KitKat::
> She took his hand and gave him a firm handshake. "Honored. Name's 
> KitKat, Predacon Warrior." She couldn't help but notice his well 
> built physical attributes. She couldn't show it, but she was smiling 
> like  young wolf pup inside. "I wish to thank you for fixing me. I 
> don't know what happened. One minute I'm training battle techniques, 
> the next, I'm walking through the woods with a belly ache and from 
> there, it gets kind of fuzzy."
> 
> Cam::
> She walked up to KitKat and tapped at her other hand. "Hey, I was the 
> one that found you. I'm Cam. He just brought you here. I found you 
> and wanted to keep you, but Blackfang said I had to ask."
> 
> KitKat::
> She couldn't help but smile at the little bot. "Oh really? You found 
> me huh? Then I owe you a thank you."  She knelt down and patted the 
> litle bot on the shoulder, looking into the little one's 
> optics. "That was a very brave thing you did. A maximal wouldn't 
> normally approach a predacon like me. You are very brave and a very 
> bold warrior little one. Keep it up."
> Then she stood up and looked at Blackfang. She couldn't figure out 
> why they didn't just leave her to die. After all, that's what a 
> predacon or decepticon would have done. She smiled at him, letting 
> her optics show the gratitude as well as her face plates. "So, I 
> guess I owe you a thanks as well huh? Oh Maximal Knight?" her voice 
> soft and light.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> > Blackfang stood up. He was even more impressed to see her as a bot
> > than when she was a wolf. By Primus was she gorgeous! However, he
> > wasn't sure if she did wish to stay.
> > 
> > Blackfang: Uh... I guess I didn't introduce myself. (he held his 
> hand
> > out) I'm Blackfang, Maximal knight.
> >
